channel.title: Help me plz
channel.description: hey i need help i have my own server and i dont know how to make me a admin and also i have this comand ::getpass when i do it it works and the persons pass comes up to a whole bunch of numbas plz help[br][size=1]Posted on: June 11, 2007, 09:24:10 PM[/size][hr]will somone plz help??

item.title: Help me plz
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Open npcHandler.java, and search for “moo”. You should find a code similar to:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
using that code outline:

if (npcs[i].npcType == IDHERE) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT HERE"; } }
Simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me plz
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

You have an encryption on the passwords. What source are you using? To make yourself an admin, find your character.txt file. Change Player rights = 0 to Player rights = 3, which makes you the server owner.

Read full topic
